doc:
David Hyde Pierce https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Hyde_Pierce 0 David Hyde Pierce (born April 3, 1959) is an American actor, director, and comedian. Pierce is known for playing the psychiatrist Dr. Niles Crane on the NBC sitcom Frasier, for which he won four Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series during the show's run. Pierce also has appeared on and directed for the stage. He won the 2007 Tony Award for Best Performance by a Leading Actor in a Musical for his performance in the musical Curtains. He also played Dr. Jones in When We Rise. David_Hyde_Pierce ( born April_3_,_1959 ) is an_American_actor , director , and comedian . Pierce is_known for playing the_psychiatrist_Dr._Niles_Crane on the_NBC_sitcom_Frasier , for which he won four_Primetime_Emmy_Awards for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Comedy_Series during the_show 's_run . Pierce also has_appeared on and directed for the_stage . He won the_2007_Tony_Award for Best Performance by a_Leading_Actor in a_Musical for his_performance in the_musical_Curtains . He also played Dr._Jones in When We Rise .
